dc.title: U.S. Congressman Bobby L. Rush - Representing Illinois 1st District
dc.description: Congressman Bobby L. Rush, Representing Illinois' 1st Distict, Congressman Bobby L. Rush proudly represents the First District of Illinois in the United States House of Representatives. When you think of singular national leaders, U. S. Representative Bobby L. Rush is a unique voice in the U.S. House of Representatives.
